CREATE PROCEDURE [tp_SetNvarcharMaxToBlockMLProps] (@tableName varchar(32) = 'TP_BLOCK') AS BEGIN DECLARE @SQLString nvarchar(500) DECLARE @suffix nvarchar(4)
DECLARE languageSuffixCursor CURSOR FOR SELECT SUFFIX FROM innovator.[LANGUAGE]
OPEN languageSuffixCursor FETCH NEXT FROM languageSuffixCursor INTO @suffix
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN SET @SQLString = 'ALTER TABLE innovator.' + @tableName +' ALTER COLUMN content' + COALESCE(@suffix, '') + ' nvarchar(max)' EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLString
FETCH NEXT FROM languageSuffixCursor INTO @suffix END
CLOSE languageSuffixCursor DEALLOCATE languageSuffixCursor END
